alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cattaraugus and northwestern Allegany Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Gowanda to Falconer to near Lottsville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olean, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Gowanda, Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, St. Bonaventure, Ashford Hollow, Hinsdale, Great Valley, New Albion, Dayton, Conewango, Leon, Carrollton, Randolph, Napoli, Little Valley and East Otto. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 15 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
